channel.title: Samony Podcast - Travel
channel.itunes:author: Samony
channel.itunes:summary: Travel news, destination guides, tourism updates, and travel tips for Nigeria and around the world.
channel.description: Travel news, destination guides, tourism updates, and travel tips for Nigeria and around the world.

item.title: Unlocking Africa: The Push for Easier Visas to Boost Continental Travel
item.description:
This episode delves into the recent Heirs Travel Festival, where diplomats and experts passionately advocated for simplified visa processes and stronger bilateral agreements across Africa. Hosts Charon and Musa discuss the economic potential of seamless continental travel, the irony of current restrictions, and the urgent need for political will to foster a truly integrated African experience.
Hosts: Host: Charon, Co-Host: Musa (Sport)
Category: Travel
------------------------------------------- Follow Samony Podcast: Twitter: https://twitter.com/samony25 Instagram: https://instagram.com/samony25 Facebook: https://facebook.com/samony25 YouTube: https://youtube.com/@samony25 TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@samony25
Website: https://www.samony.com.ng Contact us: socials@samony.com.ng -------------------------------------------
